channel.title: Yuki on horse life 98
channel.description: Recent content in Yuki on horse life 98

item.title: break
item.description: no yuki this week, sorry

item.title: food
item.description: another one of those comics with an obscure reference to Québec culture but at least you have Raymond from Animal Crossing I don’t even play Animal Crossing lol

item.title: impostor
item.description: today’s comic is so sus it has a bonus panel and yes the host in the last panel is supposed to be Guy Jodoin’s evil twin brother, Guyves, who replaced Guy on the set of Le Tricheur

item.title: vtuber
item.description: today, Yuki is a cute internet girl with a commodore 64

item.title: hippo
item.description: featuring Walrii from CodeWalrus and another one of those weird Canadian PSAs

item.title: tv
item.description: today on horse life 98 we kill a tv if you’re canadian like me I hope you remember this particular tv

item.title: bliss
item.description: you wish everything will go back to normal but will it ever go back to normal who knows happy 50th strip (yes that’s the Windows XP hill, credits to Google Street View)

item.title: comeback
item.description: Guess what, season 4 of Horse Life 98??? whaaaat Now with a new character design I drew myself and not with some weird Flash app I found on the Internets that isn’t supported anymore by major browser vendors, because I can I’ll probably never finish Paneltober, though

item.description: boom

item.description: it’s a huge wisp. radio from this site (CC BY-SA, huge spoiler for tomorrow) Start from the beginning!

item.title: 38: paneltober 2: wisp

item.title: 37: paneltober 1: fish
item.description: it’s very fishy.

item.title: 36: gravity 2
item.description: the gravity comic from 2 weeks ago, except it’s now in HTML5 using code from a comic I made back in 2013 for my old Tumblr blog too lazy to come up with something this week

item.title: 35: september
item.description: yet another comic uploaded on monday 11:59pm so that the joke works

item.title: 34: gravity
item.description: please don’t ask why gravity was off

item.title: 33: masks
item.description: masks are cool, change my mind

item.title: 32: sleep
item.description: purple miku for no reason also, it’s one of these comics I’m publishing 2 minutes early so that the joke works, happy 13th and 15th anniversary of Hatsune Miku and the single release of “Wake Me Up When September Ends”, respectively fun fact, I once made a Miku recolor with purple hair like 10 years ago, back when I figured out how to change the colors in a picture in GIMP, that and purple Amy Rose, that was wack

item.title: 31: blur
item.description: radial blur isn’t funny anymore by the third time

item.title: episode 30: time
item.description: it’s actually J.P.’s birthday next Thursday, though meanwhile, on Frivolesque…

item.title: episode 29: otakuthon
item.description: they said no this comic takes place and was made around episode 20 back when she applied to a panel at Otakuthon a while ago, hence the old 3D model, but unfortunately she’s been refused I was hoping to use it as a panel announcement if it was accepted, or reuse it later for another convention otherwise, but it’s still kinda funny and there’s a joke specific to this one convention so I’m still putting it up here as this week’s comic no matter what

item.title: episode 28: q&a 2
item.description: Yuki doesn’t even have boxing gloves

item.title: episode 27: q&a
item.description: thanks Alexis on Facebook hope it answers your question

item.title: episode 26: cake
item.description: no yuki has been harmed in this comic

item.title: episode 25: hot
item.description: yes, you, the reader you’re so hot

item.description: 2D girls are the best apparently see also

item.title: episode 23: pride
item.description: this joke with the closet got old

item.title: episode 22: long live free québec
item.description: for the record I saw an image that said Québec isn’t a country that got fact-checked by Facebook, that was weird

item.title: episode 21: television
item.description: this anime exists for real, I swear in the yukiverse, at least TV model downloaded from here, all rights to Madoshikai Wagon goes to this guy

item.title: episode 13: weed

item.description: today’s a palindrome, this comic is not

item.title: episode 10: low budget animation
item.description: I honestly thought this was a brony song until tonight when I altavista’d it and discovered it was actually the ending of some movie where it rains burgers credits to @LunarFroxy, @Tridashie and @roundtripguy on Twitter for starting a meme

item.title: episode 9: 1998
item.description: so both 2019 2 and 2020 weren’t real, where are we going now with famous guest star minty root

item.title: episode 8: 2020
item.description: turns out 2019 2 wasn’t the real year

item.title: episode 7: 2019 2
item.description: 2020 is not a real year they say

item.title: episode 6: winter
item.description: snow pone knows when it’s winter in this case, december 21st 2019 23:19 GMT-5

item.title: episode 5: recycled jokes
item.description: we used that punchline already it’s always funny

item.title: episode 4: giggles
item.description: I have no idea who this Giggles guy is but he looks nice co-written by the GPT-2 AI living at talktotransformer.com

item.title: episode 3: illegal
item.description: yuki does whatever she wants including posting this comic on sundays

item.description: radial blur makes everything funny
